settings.title: Creates a Protective Barrier
settings.text: HQC Anti Damp Paint forms a breathable membrane that seals and prevents the reappearance of damp and water stains.

settings.title: Eradicates Mould
settings.text: Its mould-killing properties eliminate existing mould and inhibit its growth, promoting a healthier indoor environment.

settings.title: Ensures Long-lasting Effect
settings.text: With its durable formulation, this paint provides long-lasting protection, keeping your walls pristine for years to come.

settings.title: Enhances Breathability
settings.text: The micro-porous structure allows moisture to evaporate, preventing paint flaking and ensuring a durable finish.

settings.title: Maintains Colour Integrity
settings.text: HQC Anti Damp Paint retains its vibrant colour over time, offering excellent colour retention for a fresh and appealing look.

settings.title: Resists Cracking & Blistering
settings.text: Its robust composition resists cracking, blistering, and peeling, ensuring a flawless finish that stands the test of time.

settings.title: Adapts to Interior & Exterior Surfaces
settings.text: Suitable for both interior and exterior use, this paint provides versatile protection wherever you need it.

settings.title: Easy Application
settings.text: With its quick-drying formula and smooth application, HQC Anti Damp Paint makes painting projects hassle-free and enjoyable.

settings.heading: PREP
settings.text: Prep your area and walls by sanding, cleaning, and ensuring the surface is smooth & dry - use primer (or mist coat) on bare surfaces or fresh plaster board

settings.heading: PAINT
settings.text: Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray
